java/liquibase/parser/visitor/ValidatingVisitor.java

00001 package liquibase.parser.visitor;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00005 import liquibase.RanChangeSet;
00006 import liquibase.change.Change;
00007 import liquibase.database.Database;
00008 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionFailedException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.SetupException;
00010 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionErrorException;
00011 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00012 import liquibase.preconditions.AndPrecondition;
00013 import liquibase.preconditions.FailedPrecondition;
00014 import liquibase.preconditions.ErrorPrecondition;
00015 
00016 import java.util.ArrayList;
00017 import java.util.HashSet;
00018 import java.util.List;
00019 import java.util.Set;
00020 
00021 public class ValidatingVisitor implements ChangeSetVisitor {
00022 
00023     private List<ChangeSet> invalidMD5Sums = new ArrayList<ChangeSet>();
00024     private List<FailedPrecondition> failedPreconditions = new ArrayList<FailedPrecondition>();
00025     private List<ErrorPrecondition> errorPreconditions = new ArrayList<ErrorPrecondition>();
00026     private Set<ChangeSet> duplicateChangeSets = new HashSet<ChangeSet>();
00027     private List<SetupException> setupExceptions = new ArrayList<SetupException>();
00028     private List<InvalidChangeDefinitionException> changeValidationExceptions = new ArrayList<InvalidChangeDefinitionException>();
00029 
00030     private Set<String> seenChangeSets = new HashSet<String>();
00031 
00032     private List<RanChangeSet> ranChangeSets;
00033 
00034     public ValidatingVisitor(List<RanChangeSet> ranChangeSets) {
00035         this.ranChangeSets = ranChangeSets;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public void validate(Database database, DatabaseChangeLog changeLog) {
00039         try {
00040             AndPrecondition precondition = changeLog.getPreconditions();
00041             if (precondition == null) {
00042                 return;
00043             }
00044             precondition.check(database, changeLog);
00045         } catch (PreconditionFailedException e) {
00046             failedPreconditions.addAll(e.getFailedPreconditions());
00047         } catch (PreconditionErrorException e) {
00048             errorPreconditions.addAll(e.getErrorPreconditions());
00049         }
00050     }
00051 
00052     public Direction getDirection() {
00053         return ChangeSetVisitor.Direction.FORWARD;
00054     }
00055 
00056     public void visit(ChangeSet changeSet, Database database) {
00057         for (Change change : changeSet.getChanges()) {
00058             try {
00059                 change.setUp();
00060             } catch (SetupException se) {
00061                 setupExceptions.add(se);
00062             }
00063 
00064             try {
00065                 change.validate(database);
00066             } catch (InvalidChangeDefinitionException e) {
00067                 changeValidationExceptions.add(e);
00068             }
00069         }
00070 
00071         for (RanChangeSet ranChangeSet : ranChangeSets) {
00072             if (ranChangeSet.getId().equals(changeSet.getId())
00073                     && ranChangeSet.getAuthor().equals(changeSet.getAuthor())
00074                     && ranChangeSet.getChangeLog().equals(changeSet.getFilePath())) {
00075                 if (!changeSet.isCheckSumValid(ranChangeSet.getMd5sum())) {
00076                     if (!changeSet.shouldRunOnChange()) {
00077                         invalidMD5Sums.add(changeSet);
00078                     }
00079                 }
00080             }
00081         }
00082 
00083 
00084         String changeSetString = changeSet.toString(false);
00085         if (seenChangeSets.contains(changeSetString)) {
00086             duplicateChangeSets.add(changeSet);
00087         } else {
00088             seenChangeSets.add(changeSetString);
00089         }
00090     }
00091 
00092     public List<ChangeSet> getInvalidMD5Sums() {
00093         return invalidMD5Sums;
00094     }
00095 
00096 
00097     public List<FailedPrecondition> getFailedPreconditions() {
00098         return failedPreconditions;
00099     }
00100 
00101     public List<ErrorPrecondition> getErrorPreconditions() {
00102         return errorPreconditions;
00103     }
00104 
00105     public Set<ChangeSet> getDuplicateChangeSets() {
00106         return duplicateChangeSets;
00107     }
00108 
00109     public List<SetupException> getSetupExceptions() {
00110         return setupExceptions;
00111     }
00112 
00113     public List<InvalidChangeDefinitionException> getChangeValidationExceptions() {
00114         return changeValidationExceptions;
00115     }
00116 
00117     public boolean validationPassed() {
00118         return invalidMD5Sums.size() == 0
00119                 && failedPreconditions.size() == 0
00120                 && errorPreconditions.size() == 0
00121                 && duplicateChangeSets.size() == 0
00122                 && changeValidationExceptions.size() == 0
00123                 && setupExceptions.size() == 0;
00124     }
00125 
00126 }
